about.metaDescription: Learn more about Gustavo FalcÃ£o, Solutions Architect and Software Engineer.
about.title: Who am I?
about.bio1: I'm Gustavo FalcÃ£o, I'm a Solutions Architect and Software Engineer with over a decade of technology experience. My journey began in electronics, evolved to web development and Linux automation, and culminated in my Computer Engineering degree.
about.bio2: This multidisciplinary path gives me a unique view of development, combining practical electronics knowledge, advanced operating systems mastery, and software development expertise.
